Others: Lesotho and Benin are participating in the 2026 FIFA World Cup qualifiers.
Lesotho is ranked 153rd in the world and has never qualified for any major tournament before.
In their opening game of the World Cup qualifier, Lesotho was held to a 1-1 draw by Nigeria.
Benin went down 2-1 to South Africa in their opening qualifier.
In their previous two encounters, Benin beat Lesotho 1-0 before the sides drew 0-0 (both coming in the Africa Cup of Nations qualifiers, in November 2020).
The match is taking place at the Orlando Stadium in Johannesburg, South Africa.
